Articles.Content:
Mild language warning.

Edited June 19, 2013 by WhiteWeasel
Should I feel bad because I have no idea who he is?

Personally I don't like his instructor, scott manley would be so much better.

His vids usually hover about 100K for the most part.

It might be only me , MIGHT , but i think Scott has a glance of arseholery.While i enjoy his videos , i don't really like how he talks to other people and how he tryes to use that kind of annoying sarcasm.

Yeah, I'm not terribly keen on Scott either. It's just the tone of his voice for me, the way he speaks makes it seem like he's talking down to you even when he's being perfectly polite and friendly. Same problem I have with Richard Dawkins, though it's an order of magnitude worse with that guy.

It might be only me , MIGHT , but i think Scott has a glance of arseholery.While i enjoy his videos , i don't really like how he talks to other people and how he tryes to use that kind of annoying sarcasm.

Well he is more knowledgeable, but he might be a bit too serious for him. But then again he has worked with totalbiscuit the cynical brit. Either way more publicity for us.

PS: The "instructor" said to add rcs ports, but didn't add monopropellant. I'm just really miffed about that, and I just said the first person who was knowledgeable about the game. Maybe HOC or kurt?

Edited June 19, 2013 by WhiteWeasel

Mild Language warning.

On second thought scott maley shouldn't teach him because he'd be slamming his head against the table by the time the video is over.
